name: Blockchain Cuties Dark Theme with cooldown colors
description:
You need the browser extension "Stylus" to use this theme! (Currently available on desktop Chrome, Opera, Firefox and Firefox Android) A dark version of the web UI (https://blockchaincuties.co) with additional indicators and some fixes Features:
  • - cooldown indicator colors from red to green
  • - many hover effects added for better user experience
  • - changed (not all yet) icon pictures to font awesome icons for better scaling and coloring
  • - made some buttons more rectangle with smaller border radius
  • - adventure report results are more visible and centered
  • - adventure reports are a bit more dynamic with some animations ;)
  • - custom picture option for the owner pic on the cutie's page and leaderboards
  • - hidden discord / telegram icons
  • - hidden adventure cooldown on siring market
  • - removed the "Buy now" button from items under "My market"
additional_info: New version brings update matching the Cuties' Element update (with profile pictures on the battle report!) >>Try out some mods and scripts I made to the game, like currency converter, or gas price tracker:<< (you need the extension ViolentMonkey / Tampermonkey to be able to run them) https://bit.ly/2zA2osh Any recommendations, bugs, requests are welcome My Îž and Cuties address: 0xa1C299326473983C303eEbb76E0cb062857Cd9Cb Join the game here: https://bit.ly/2zEdqwK
